arts.ttl: Fiorentina Manager Palladino Reflects on Missed Opportunity Against Torino
arts.sum: Fiorentina manager Raffaele Palladino expressed his disappointment following his team's 1-1 draw against Torino. Speaking to DAZN after the match, Palladino acknowledged the missed opportunity to secure a victory, especially after Torino was reduced to ten men. The post Fiorentina Manager Palladino Reflects on Missed Opportunity Against Torino appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina 1-1 Torino: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina's worrying run of form continued as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Torino at the Stadio Artemio Franchi, despite the visitors playing with 10 men for over an hour. This result extends La Viola's winless streak to six Serie A matches, during which they have collected a mere two points. The post Serie A | Fiorentina 1-1 Torino: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog including Inter-Empoli, Verona-Lazio and Fiorentina-Torino
Serie A | Fiorentina v Torino: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Fiorentina face a minor setback as they prepare for their upcoming match againstTorino, with midfielder Danilo Cataldi sidelined due to a thigh issue. This opens up opportunities for Amir Richardson, Rolando Mandragora, and newcomer Michael Folorunsho to vie for a starting position alongside Yacine Adli in the center of the pitch. The post Serie A | Fiorentina v Torino: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs Torino for three important points
arts.sum: Fiorentina have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Serie A matches against Torino (W2 D1), as many times as in their previous 14; the Viola have not recorded four clean sheets in a row against the Granata in the competition since October 1969. Torino have won 50 Serie A matches against Fiorentina (D51 L50), more than against any other team in the competition.
